name: Dual Core
description: A vibrant, futuristic, twin-stick style, co-op, action adventure for 1-4 players. Battle through a world of explosive robotic mayhem - Add a generous helping of sci-fi intrigue, and a dash of RPG ELEMENTS!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: dual core 2 ghz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
